name: Shade (Demo)
description:
One night in October 13th 1983, a cult of 7 killers called: The Severed Eye Cult killed 66 people. They disappeared and were never seen again. 10 years have past, now they've returned.

On the anniversary of that horrible night, the survivors are in danger of getting murdered. You're Detective Cunningham, your mission is to ask questions, gather information and stake out at the survivors locations and guard them from the murders, spot the murders and detain them.

Demo Out Now!
